title: Space Tribute
description:
Space Tribute is a shoot'em up game where you have to face old games enemies.
Careful with the boss, it is.... unstable
Each level increases the speed, how far will you go?

title: Elephant in the Room
description: Small puzzle game created in PICO-8 for Github Game Off 2022. Help the mouse to leave the rooms by getting the elephant to break the door!
developer: Ekaktusz, Zahkros, Bartalomew, Mate Hirsch, Lorinc Fazakas

title: Birdie Bartender
description:
Birdie Bartender is an arcade GameBoy-style time-management game. You manage a Birdie Bar and your job is to serve drinks like beer and wine and help Birdie the bartender earn some money so she can afford a nice vacation. Do a day job as bartender and serve quick to earn more money and make your customers happy.
Music by Scott Semanski.

title: Twistbot
description: You play as a little droid trying to escape a tower. With the ability to switch perspectives after you reach a certain level.

title: Ozelotl
description: Experience an epic space adventure with Ozelotl! After a catastrophic event wipes out humanity on Earth, you must embark on a daring mission to reclaim it. Join the crew of the aircraft carrier Tebeyolotl as they journey through the depths of space, armed with 24 different types of Ozelotl. Will you be able to save humanity and restore the planet to its former glory?

title: Birds with Guns
description:
An Owl-some Roguelike Twin-Stick Shooter

Are you ready to have a quacking time? Toucan play this egg-citing game right now! Made by an im-peck-able team of quail-ified developers, you're gonna have no egrets.

Evil Robofox has captured all the birds to steal their eggs. The bird kingdom is counting on you to save them!

title: Cherry Rescue
description:
Barry's sister, Mary, has been captured by a mysterious foe, and you must rescue her!

Run, jump, and stomp the baddies who stand in your way, and get to the end of each level unscathed!

Music by Scott Semanski.

title: envisionator
description: This is a short puzzle game about escaping a building lockdown with the aid of your trusty robot friend.

title: Retroid
description:
“Retroid” is a retro-style game based on classic arcade games, that challenges players to control a paddle at the bottom of the screen and reflect a ball to destroy bricks at the top.

With 20 levels, 5 level designs, 6 bonus items (plus 1 malus item), 8 chiptune tracks, an epic boss battle

-----: Deprecated Games below! -------, use `_id instead of id

title: UFO Blocks
description: It's another day on the job at the block factory, and the blocks just keep on coming! Use your trusty tractor beam to pick up blocks and place them somewhere else. Match three in a row of the same type to remove them. Try to chain together combos, but be sure to move quickly- if the blocks reach the top, it's game over!

title: Captain Callisto
description: The Adventures of Captain Callisto is a short 3D action game.

title: Asteroids
description: Asteroids is a space-themed multidirectional shooter arcade game, control the spaceship to destroy asteroids and flying saucers.
